summary: Years before Father Lankester Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu leads to the rediscovery of his faith.
cast: Stellan Skarsgård|Gabriel Mann|Clara Bellar|Billy Crawford|Ralph Brown|Israel Oyelumade|Andrew French|Antonie Kamerling|Julian Wadham|Eddie Osei|Ilario Bisi-Pedro|Niall Refoy|Lorenzo Camporese|Burt Caesar|Marcello Santoni|Griet van Damme|Simon McLinden|Pet Chege|Hamadi Mwapachu|Evelyn Duah|Rick Warden|Michele Mariotti|Ben Meyjes|Oliver Maltman|Omari Carter|Adrian Black|Nick Komornicki

title: El exorcista: El comienzo - La versión prohibida
